title: Experienced VIdeo Editor (full time)
job_overview:
Here are more details about the position:
Fully remote, independent contractor, direct hire for a US company
Permanent position, full time 40 hours per week
This is for an e-commerce company in the US
Work schedule: Tuesday - Saturday, 5:00 AM â€“ 2:00 PM Philippine Time (PHT) (this is non flexible, and non negotiable)
Offer: 950 - 1,050 USD per month + see benefits below

We're seeking a dynamic Video Editor who understands the nuances of creating
compelling content for today's fast-paced social media landscape.

We are a direct-to-consumer brand incubator; focused on creating products
that people love. Today, we own and operate a portfolio of brands with products that put you
first. We take a unique approach to each brand and every product, making sure that we are
fulfilling a real need while helping to shift the status quo.

This is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated individual, eager to excel in a fast-paced
and growth-centric setting. We're looking for someone who understands Video Editing best
practices, is deadline-oriented, and detail-focused, and has thrived in a remote role.

Responsibilities
? Utilize CapCut to create innovative and visually appealing videos.
? Testing new AI video editing software tools and conducting training with respective video
editors to improve their efficiency and quality when creating social media ads.
? Platform-Specific Video Creation: Design and edit video ads tailored for Facebook,
Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok, ensuring each video is optimized for its respective
platform.
? Engaging Content Creation: Produce videos that not only look great but also captivate
viewers within the first few seconds, effectively "stopping the scroll."
? Footage Integration: Seamlessly integrate internal video footage with stock footage,
ensuring a cohesive and engaging narrative.
? Text & Animation: Implement compelling text overlays and animations to enhance the
video's message. Proficiency in Adobe After Effects to create animations is a significant
plus.
? Sound Design: Select and integrate music tracks that resonate with the video's
messaging and amplify viewer engagement.
? Target Audience Connection: Understand and implement video editing techniques that
resonate with the target customer for the specific product or brand being advertised.
? Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing and content teams to align on campaign
objectives and creative direction.
Requirements
? 2+ years of video editing experience
? Experience in editing videos, making ones for social media or documentaries are a plus
? Openness and current experience when experimenting with AI tools that can improve
current workflows in terms of efficiency and quality output.
? Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects; experience with CapCut or
AI editing tools is a plus.
? A strong portfolio showcasing your best video edits for social media and/or
documentaries that show your ability to visually tell a story
? Exceptional attention to detail and a keen eye for storytelling through visuals.
? Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
? Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal in English
? A deep understanding of social media trends and the evolving nature of digital consumer
behavior

Benefits
? Fully Remote Position
? Observed Local Philippine Holiday's
? Bonus Program
? Paid Vacation
? HMO Plan after 6 month probationary period

To apply:
1. PDF FILE - Send links to examples of your best video work
2. Link to a 2 minute video introduction of you and your work as video editor
3. Link to your complete online portfolio or a link to your Canva site (Canva site has to be downloadable), or a Google drive link to your portfolio (preferably a file, not folders)
4. Asking salary in USD, monthly rate, 40 hours per week

Kindly email to Upgrade to see actual info with subject: Video Editor application for Ecom.
